column5: My son and I are heading to Ghost River Lodge on Saturday the 14th and are driving as far as Kenora. Any advice on where to stay for a quick nights sleep? Thanks....Mark
Is the Super 8 right on the highway? Thanks for the help......Mark

Masher, Going to GRL as well but leaving on Friday the 13th and boating in on the 14th. I'm staying the night before in Sioux Lookout at the Best Western because the boat landing is still 25 miles from Sioux Lookout and they like to start boating in by about 8AM if I recall correctlyKenora is still a distance to go if that is your plan or if you have a late boat-in. Just thought I would let you know.See you there!Cheers!Tom
I've stayed at the Best Western Lakeside in Kenora. Very nice. Have a great trip.

Thanks Tom, we aren't going in until Sunday, and can't leave Bismarck until 4:00 Saturday, and that is as far as I want to drive. They are picking us up at 1:00 on Sunday. We are staying at Sturgeon River in cabin #2, stop by and say hi. Hope you have a safe trip.....Mark

Safe trip to you as well Mark. We are in cabin #3 at SRL and should have a fishing report for you by the time you arrive. We plan on fishing part of Saturday and then Sunday with a shore lunch on Sunday. Can't wait. Look for myself, my son and the blonde gal that is my soon-to-be wife!! She is the better looking of the 3!!!
Hi Masher & Sidge61, I am going to GRL on Aug. 31 please let us know your trip went. Have a great time.Thanks in advance.wmd
Syaed there in mid June on our way to north of Vermillion Bay on Friday night. Reasonable and a MC D's next door for coffee. Served a nice $6 breakfast right at the hotel too.
